title: Group portrait of wedding party with one flower girl, five men, including groom wearing moustache, light colored bow tie, and light colored flower on left lapel, and three women, including bride, wearing tiara with long veil, earrings, light colored off the shoulder satin wedding dress with floral lace overlay on bust and embroidered design down front of full skirt with crinoline, holding Bible with flowers and ribbons, posed in front of altar of church with plants, candles, organ pipes, stained glass windows, and cross possibly for wedding at Park Place African Methodist Episcopal Church in Homestead, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
